Detailed Description

Drag and drop object for transfering machines.

Member Function Documentation

const char * MimeMachine::format (  int i = 0 )  const
 

Returns the format string (MIME-Type).

This is "text/qfsm-objects". Only one format is available so if i!=0, this method will return NULL.
